Product Title: AIFAIFA 9Pcs Gel Nail Polish Set, Burgundy Nail Polish Kits Red Colors Soak Off UV/LED Nail Polish Set, Gel Polish with Base Coat & Glossy & Matte Top All-Season Salon Manicure Art Design Red

Product Details: {'Brand': 'AIFAIFA', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Color': 'Burgundy,Red', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy, Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic', 'Unit Count': '9.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '9', 'Package Dimensions': '7.99 x 4.21 x 2.83 inches; 11.99 Ounces'}
Review Text: The shades are not exactly as pictured but still nice! I like that they cure QUICK!  Some brands are too thick or something and require a long time to cure but this one was done in one 5 min session!
Review Title: Cured quickly!

This is labeled as babys cologne but omg it smells good enough for ALL to wear!!!  Its clean yet lightly floral!

I really am loving this brand!!! I have 2 different scents now and they are both clean and floral smelling! It says its for babies but me and my teenage daughters prefer this soft scent vs bath and body works!!! Now i just need to buy the 3rd scent mint poppy !
Smells soft and clean!!!

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Fragrance Preference:** Enjoys clean, fresh scents with floral notes, as indicated by previous purchases demonstrating a strong appeal to various age groups.

- **Product Sensitivity:** Values products that are gentle for children and suitable for sensitive skin, highlighting a focus on safety and gentle formulations.

- **Natural Ingredients:** Strong preference for natural, cruelty-free, and hypoallergenic products, reflecting a commitment to environmentally friendly and ethical choices.

- **Versatility:** Appreciates fragrances labeled for children's use, showcasing flexibility in consumer habits and an appeal for broader use among teenagers.

- **Quality Consideration:** Engages positively with brands that meet or exceed expectations, showing a discerning approach based on experiences. High ratings for recent products indicate satisfaction with quality.

- **Positive Engagement:** Open to trying multiple products from trusted brands, reflecting a willingness to explore new options while prioritizing health, quality, and versatility.

- **Nail Care Interest:** Recently purchased a gel nail polish set, indicating an interest in beauty products beyond fragrance. The user appreciates quick-curing formulations and has a positive outlook on product performance, indicating a discerning taste for quality in various cosmetic categories.

Overall, this user is thoughtful and discerning in their product choices, prioritizing safety, natural ingredients, quality, and versatility, while also expanding their interests in beauty products.
